game.name: 007: Racing
game.desc:
Be Bond, Behind The Wheel Pay attention, 007. This is for your eyes only. Q-Branch has re-engineered some of your favorite automobiles with additional gadgets and firepower. You'll need everything they've got, plus your own uncanny ability to beat the odds. The free world is depending on you. Oh, one other thing before you go 007--try to bring them back in one piece.
MISSION BRIEFING • Q-branch Vehicles - BMW, Aston Martin, and Lotus • Exciting Missions & Beautiful Women • Ingenious Gadgets - Smoke Screens, Stinger Missiles, and More • Dangerous Assailants Interfere From Air, Sea and Ground • 2-player Action
